ORSHIN Attack Defense Framework

Link Layer LLID Deadlock

Description

Link Layer LLID Deadlock

Risk Assesment: 7.4

CWE

120

CVE

17060

17061

Attack Surfaces

BLE (MITRE EMB3D PID-4111)

Session (MITRE EMB3D PID-41)

Attack Vectors

DoS (MITRE EMB3D TID-404)

Defenses

Restrict Link Layer payload length, Validate Link Layer payload length at runtime
